p:
Next, the M/F ratios from the pdmH1N1 in the different age groups were compared with those for seasonal influenza in 2005 ( table 3). As shown in table 3 and figure 2C, the M/F ratios for pdmH1N1 influenza were significantly higher in ages 4–29 years and significantly lower in ages 30–79 years. The statistical methods used in tables 1–
3 are explained in the appendix S1. Supplementary data are available online as Tables S1, S2, S3, and S4.
